description:
A National-Scale Framework for Visualizing Riverine Concentrations of Microplastics Released from Municipal Wastewater Treatment Incorporating Generalized Instream Losses.

iSTREEM® is an in-stream environmental exposure model which predicts the concentration of a chemical used in "down-the-drain" products. It is a tool to promote product stewardship and regulatory compliance for chemical suppliers and manufacturers of formulated products of all sizes across commodity groups.

Predicted environmental concentrations are calculated for the continental United States and several watersheds in Canada:.
name: iSTREEM
